/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a mix of green and brown, suggesting a transition between seasons. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. Power lines run parallel to the road, a common sight in urban landscapes. A few cars can be seen on the road, adding a touch of life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The image does not provide any specific details that could be used to identify the exact location within Beijing.
